item.title: How Costco may soon make investors happy again — with a special dividend
item.description: Some on Wall Street expect to hear good news early next year.

item.title: This chip play’s strong 2025 run could hit a speed bump as earnings loom, charts show
item.description: Micron is toting a sizable gain on a year-to-date basis as its earnings release approaches, but that momentum may not last.

item.title: Bank of America's top chip stocks to play AI in 2026
item.description: AI poster child Nvidia is among Bank of America's top six for 2026.

item.title: Here's an unusual AI play for 2026: Glasses
item.description: Eyewear stock Warby Parker has room to run and offers exposure to the AI trade, according to Piper Sandler. The firm will roll out its AI glasses next...

item.title: Investors are all in on stocks: Bank of America survey shows record low cash level
item.description: The share of portfolios in cash fell to a record low 3.3% in December, according to the bank's Global Fund Manager survey.
